name: Bun Cha Hang Quat
specialty: Bun Cha (grilled pork with rice noodles)
description: Hidden alley stall frequented by locals. Family-run operation with lightning speed service. Assembly line cooking with fermented rice noodles, fresh herbs, grilled pork belly & meatballs, crispy crab spring rolls. Lunch only, closes at 2pm.

name: Pho 10 Ly Quoc Su
description: Famous pho spot serving soup with brisket, filet, and beef flank. Comes with fried dough sticks.

name: Banh Cuon Nong Kim Thoa
description: Famous family recipe for rice rolls with ground pork and mushrooms, served with fish sauce dip. Super local stall.

name: Banh Mi Hoi An
description: Banh mi with stewed pork in Hoi An style

name: Bún Chả Hương Liên
description: Famous bun cha restaurant recommended by Anthony Bourdain

name: Quan Cat Ba
description: Super fresh grilled squid and fish cakes right by the water

name: Dong Ba Market Bun Bo Hue Stall
description: Authentic Bun Bo Hue (spicy beef noodle soup) served by elderly lady who provides multiple local dishes including rice cakes, dumplings, and Nem Lui (grilled pork on lemongrass stalks)

name: Madame Thu Restaurant
specialty: Banh Loc (rice cakes in banana leaves)
description: Traditional rice cakes and dumplings steamed in banana leaves

name: Banh Mi Phuong
description: Anthony Bourdain's favorite banh mi spot and the best one according to the itinerary

name: Long Com Ga
description: Chicken and rice dish with offal and congealed blood

name: Hai Chiến Cao Lầu
description: Traditional Hoi An noodle dish mentioned in Bourdain's guide

name: Bun Rieu Ganh
description: Family-run restaurant specializing in crab paste noodle soup with tofu, pork sausage, bean sprouts, served with shrimp paste/tamarind sauce. Cooked in massive cauldron with bold seafood flavors.

name: Banh Mi Huynh Hoa
description: Popular with locals, serves the largest and most loaded banh mi with thick layer of paté and sweet pork floss

name: Hot Vit Lon Kim Thao
description: Specialist in balut (17-day fertilized duck eggs) served with chili and fish dipping sauce. Owner has perfected the boiling process.

name: Quan An Co Lieng
specialty: Bo La Lot & Bun Thit Nuong
description: Grilled seasoned beef wrapped in betel leaves and rice noodles with grilled pork

name: The Lunch Lady (Nguyễn Thị Thành)
description: Famous street food vendor mentioned in Bourdain's guide
